constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 140 (Tuesday, August 30, 2022)]
[House]
[Pages H7731-H7732]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. NORTON:
H.R. 8763.
[[Page H7732]]
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Clause 18 of section 8 of article I of the Constitution.

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

title: Federal Retirement Thrift Investment Board Inspector General Act of 2022
